p: All experiments with mice were approved by an external committee according to the national guidelines of the animal welfare law in Germany (BGBl. I S. 1206, 1313 and BGBl. I S. 1934). The protocol used in these experiments has been reviewed by an ethics committee and approved by the Niedersächsisches Landesamt für Verbraucherschutz und Lebensmittelsicherheit, Oldenburg, Germany (permit number 3392 42502-04-13/1234). Mice were maintained under specific-pathogen-free conditions at the animal facilities of the Helmholtz Centre for Infection Research (HZI). Embryonated chicken eggs were purchased from Charles River Laboratories, Germany.
